entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kugaaruk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:32 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -34.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kugaaruk Airport 08:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -34.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -49
Dewpoint: -38.9°C

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 34.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 34. Wind chill minus 55 this morning and minus 46 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
